name: Unacast Location Intelligence API
description: Privacy-compliant location intelligence platform providing first-party mobility data and insights including footfall measurement, visit duration, and demographic analytics for retail, real estate, and public health applications.

access_info.pricing_model: Custom pricing ranging from $1 per API call to $50,000 annually based on data scope and requirements
access_info.rate_limits: Enterprise-specific limits based on subscription tier

endpoints.description: Query footfall and visitation metrics for specified locations
endpoints.response_format: JSON with footfall metrics and demographics

endpoints.description: Create and manage audience segments based on location behavior

research_notes.api_summary: Unacast provides location intelligence APIs that transform mobility data into actionable business insights while maintaining strict privacy compliance. The platform processes 60-70 billion daily location signals to deliver metrics on footfall, visit patterns, and demographic analytics for retail, real estate, and public health applications.

name: Near Intelligence API (Discontinued)
description: Former location intelligence platform that provided consumer behavior insights through geospatial data analytics for retail, advertising, and market research applications. Service discontinued following bankruptcy in 2023.

access_info.pricing_model: Service discontinued - previously subscription-based with custom enterprise pricing

endpoints.description: Historical endpoint for querying foot traffic data

research_notes.api_summary: Near Intelligence was a location intelligence company that specialized in consumer behavior insights through geospatial data analytics. Despite filing for bankruptcy in 2023, the platform historically provided APIs for retail foot traffic analysis, demographic segmentation, and location-based marketing insights.

name: Foursquare Places API
description: Comprehensive location platform providing real-time venue search, place data enrichment, and geospatial intelligence with a global database of 100+ million POIs enriched by 16 billion user-verified check-ins and reviews.

access_info.pricing_model: Freemium with $200/month free credits, then tiered pricing from $1.25-$18.75 CPM based on endpoint type and volume
access_info.rate_limits: QPS limits vary by plan tier

technical_info.auth_method: API keys via Authorization Bearer header

endpoints.description: Search for places by name, category, or location with rich metadata
endpoints.response_format: JSON with place details, location, categories, and metadata

endpoints.description: Get autocomplete suggestions for place names and addresses
endpoints.response_format: JSON with autocomplete suggestions and place data

research_notes.api_summary: Foursquare Places API provides comprehensive location intelligence through a global database of 100+ million POIs. The platform offers real-time venue search, place data enrichment, and geospatial intelligence capabilities, enhanced by 16 billion user-verified check-ins and leveraging H3 geospatial indexing for advanced location-based applications.
